thread.title: Sahil Bhasin
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Sahil Bhasin

author: Sahil Bhasin
title: Sahil Bhasin
text:
Anyone would be delighted to have their property managed through Madeleine Cahill at Nelson Alexander Preston. I have a handful of investment properties and have experienced numerous agents and rental department staff, who are normally incompetent, due to the high turnover.
Madeleine is a mature and profession individual and is always ahead of the game, keeping names and numbers of trades you would like used, following up tenants requests within days. Proving her advice and professional option on matters.
Recently I requested Madeleine to requests the tenants vacate a property and then changed my mind one day later; however it was too late due to Madeleineâ€™s efficiency, as the notice was already sent out by registered post on the same day as my request.
Would highly recommend Madeleine Cahill if you are looking for a Property Manager in the local area.
